data.text: @JustineMercer3 @nzherald The rules are the same all thru NZ RATs can be collected for free from Community Testing Sites if you have symptoms, are a Household Contact or a Critical Worker or directed by a Health Official. Anyone else wanting them for other reasons can purchase.
@WinnieC38 @nzherald We must pay for them then in our area , it’s on the list from the COVID site . To go and get one . Along with the Pharmacist they said to go and get them from
@JustineMercer3 @nzherald Countdown are not part of the MOH distribution network they are a private retail supply.

@JustineMercer3 @nzherald That's up to employers I guess, but it's a terrible idea to test people who are asymptomatic or maybe even mild, if people can work, they should work. Work shortages are not without harm also.
@WinnieC38 @nzherald Not in my area , ran out as fast as arrived , countdown has a 2 wk wait

@DavidRotherton @nzherald Trouble is people are now also walking into cold n flu season , jobs want you tested , I know several people down with bronchitis , obviously must be doing it’s rounds . Everyone has to be tested only for COVID, anything like our area they all ran out of RATS .
@nzherald So speaks Beaker(from the Muppets) whose never got anything wrong in his entire life. Hey didn't he go on Dancing with the Stars?
@nzherald And destroyed the lives of many...

@FlyingSquadComs @nzherald Oh the Opposition is so shallow and devoid of ideas it has to attack the DG Health.  Cant see a single member of that crowd who is as accountable as Ashleigh Bloomfield is. Every day.
